name: Snail Hail
description:
Hi again! This time we brought you a completely new game. Snail Hail is a local player vs player racing game with cute snails as characters.

This project got us 1st place in our university's offline 48 hours game jam called Mage Jam vol V! We had lots of fun creating it and we hope it will bring you same amount of fun while playing it.

Team:

Code: Paweł Łukaszewski

Art: Barbara Kaniewska

Design: Edyta Janicka

3... 2... 1... START!
